itqan_description: "Itqan Capital" is an investment company that offers Sharia-compliant investment products and services, operating in the Saudi financial market and the markets of the Gulf Cooperation Council countries
financial_services: We offer you a range of financial services, research, asset management, and other specialized services
murabaha_sukuk_fund: Itqan Fund for Murabaha and Sukuk
itqan_intro: The culture of excellence is ingrained in how we behave and work together, for the benefit of our clients and as one team.
itqan_vision_text: Itqan Capital aims to be the leading company in Saudi Arabia, providing suitable investment opportunities and products for retirement funds, charitable and endowment institutions, private and public companies, and wealthy individuals and family businesses.
itqan_mission_text: We believe in the values of authenticity, credibility, professionalism, and adherence to Sharia rules and provisions. Our pursuit of excellence continues tirelessly, no matter our achievements.
itqan_culture_text_1: The culture of Itqan is deeply rooted in what we offer to our clients and to ourselves as a team.
itqan_culture_text_2: Complete commitment to serving our clients
itqan_culture_text_3: Preservation of the spirit of creativity and innovation
itqan_culture_text_4: Constant pursuit of excellence and efficiency
distinction_card1_text: We do not just fulfill our duties, we pursue them with passion. Our commitment to serving our clients always comes first.
distinction_card2_text: We are all determined to excel in efficiency, ethics, and discipline. We move steadily towards achieving our goals.
distinction_card3_text: Creativity, experience, and authenticity help us excel in what we pursue and exceed our clients' expectations.

privacy_policy: We are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. The information provided in this form will only be used to communicate with you and respond to your inquiries.
contact_us_subtitle: We are here to answer your inquiries and provide support. Please fill out the form and one of our representatives will contact you as soon as possible.
address_details: Kingdom of Saudi Arabia / Jeddah/ Al Zahraa District – Ahmed Al Attas Street Al Zahraa Commercial Center, Unit 2563, Jeddah 23425-2753 Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
company_description: “Itqan Capital” is an investment company headquartered in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, licensed by the Capital Market Authority.
newsletter_description: Join us to stay updated on all new investment tips
rights_reserved: Itqan Capital © 2024. All rights reserved. Created For Itqan Capital
seo_title: Itqan Capital: Leadership in Islamic Investment and Financial Services in Saudi Arabia
seo_description: Discover Itqan Capital, the leading Saudi company offering Sharia-compliant investment products and services. With a focus on precision, passion, and excellence, we are committed to achieving the highest investment standards for our clients in the Saudi financial market and GCC markets.
about_us_paragraph_1: Itqan Capital is a Saudi closed joint stock company providing Sharia-compliant investment products and services in the Saudi financial market and GCC Arab countries markets. The company is licensed by the Capital Market Authority to engage in dealing, managing investments and operating funds, arranging, advising, and custody in securities operations. The company holds a commercial registration number (4030167335) dated 2007/3/6, with a paid-up capital of (56,042,030) Saudi Riyals. Itqan Capital is licensed by the Saudi Capital Market Authority under license number (37-07058) dated 2007/04/09 and started its operations on 2008/04/29.
about_us_paragraph_2: We strive with all our strength and determination to lead and be the most trusted Saudi company in offering investment offers to individuals, organizations, institutions, and private companies. Itqan is our name and our message that carries within it the values and concepts we believe in: perfection, precision, and passion. We provide guidance based on these values, offering a range of professional and trustworthy services. At Itqan Capital, we focus on designing and managing a variety of the best investment products and services that achieve profitable returns for investors, considering potential risks and strong growth for our company's shareholders.
about_us_paragraph_3: Itqan Capital is wholly owned by Al Zamil Development & Investment Holding Company, a specialized company in several sectors with a record of achievements inside and outside the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
AboutUS_title: Itqan Capital: Leading in Islamic investment and financial services in the Kingdom.
AboutUS_description: Discover Ihsan Capital, the leading Saudi company in providing Sharia-compliant investment products and services. With a focus on precision, passion, and excellence, we are committed to achieving the highest investment standards for our clients in the Saudi financial market and Gulf Cooperation Council countries.
shariyah_review_paragraph: Itqan Capital collaborates with the Sharia Supervisory Board, whose team is committed to working with us and providing Sharia-compliant solutions for our products. Effective communication with their network of Sharia advisors effectively supports our rapid product launches, giving us competitive advantages.
learn_more_button: Learn More About the Sharia Supervisory Board
advisory_research_title: Advisory and Research Services at Itqan Capital - Investment Advisory and Research Capabilities
advisory_research_description: Explore advisory and research services provided by Itqan Capital, including investment advisory and research capabilities supporting its core activities in direct investment, investment banking, and conservation services.
wealth_management_services_description1: The Wealth Management team works to meet the investment needs of individual and corporate clients by offering a variety of innovative and distinctive products and services that meet our clients' needs and achieve their investment ambitions, God willing.
wealth_management_services_description2: The Wealth Management team possesses scientific qualifications and extensive experience in serving the interests of our clients, investors, and the community at large by offering the best investment products and services that yield profitable returns for clients while considering potential risks, thereby building strong, long-term relationships with our clients.
conservation_services_title: Conservation Services at Itqan Capital - Real Estate Fund and Direct Investment
conservation_services_description: Learn about the conservation services offered by Itqan Capital, including real estate funds and direct investment, benefiting from expertise in wealth management to achieve sustainable and favorable investment goals for investors.
conservation_services_main_description: We are highly committed to maintaining our leadership by delivering exceptional, tailored services in real estate, private direct investment, and investment funds. We consult with each client to identify their specific needs and design necessary solutions to meet their company goals. With Itqan Capital's streamlined business and operational capabilities, we offer seamless services to our clients with a competitive fee structure.
client_awareness_title: Customer Service at Itqan Capital - Reports, Data, Complaint Procedures
client_awareness_description: Discover customer service at Itqan Capital, including recent financial market reports, complaint procedures, and investor protection guide to ensure a safe and transparent investment experience.
